Data comes in scattered (Google Forms, WhatsApp, Email)
Hard to track form responses for marketing follow-ups
Manual data entry wastes hours of productivity

problems.problem: People don't know what to write in cold emails or follow-up messages
problemDetails: 95% of businesses write poor outreach emails
Don't know how to structure first message, follow-ups, and sales nurtures

problems.problem: Marketing analytics are scattered across platforms
problemDetails: Businesses juggle Google Sheets, Email tools, Form builders, and separate CRMs

faq.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheadline: Everything you need to know about our AI Digital Marketing Platform

questions.question: What is inShare's AI digital marketing platform?
questions.answer: inShare is a complete AI digital marketing platform with AI marketing automation and AI in digital marketing capabilities. It combines CRM system, dynamic form builder, WhatsApp marketing automation, AI cold email generator, and content tracker in one unified platform - everything you need for lead generation and sales automation.

questions.question: How does AI marketing automation work in inShare?
questions.answer: Our AI marketing automation learns from your campaigns and automatically optimizes follow-up sequences. AI in digital marketing analyzes engagement patterns, writes personalized messages, and sends follow-ups until leads respond. The system handles cold email outreach, WhatsApp messages, and reminder emails completely hands-free.

questions.question: Do I need technical skills to use the AI digital marketing features?
questions.answer: No. Our AI digital marketing platform is designed for small businesses without technical teams. The dynamic form builder uses drag-and-drop, AI writes your emails automatically, and the CRM system is simple to learn. Everything works together seamlessly with AI marketing automation handling the complex tasks.

questions.question: Is inShare a free CRM with AI capabilities?
questions.answer: We offer affordable plans starting at â‚¹99/month with full CRM system features. Unlike expensive CRM platforms like HubSpot, our customer relationship management system is lightweight, built specifically for lead capture and AI marketing automation. You get AI in digital marketing, WhatsApp integration, and dynamic forms without the complexity.

questions.question: What makes your dynamic form builder unique?
questions.answer: Our dynamic form builder has an AI chat assistant that makes form filling conversational. Leads chat with AI, and the system extracts data automatically. Forms integrate directly with our CRM system, triggering AI marketing automation workflows for instant follow-ups - a unique combination no other form tool offers.

questions.question: Can the AI write cold emails for me?
questions.answer: Yes. Our AI digital marketing engine generates industry-specific cold email templates and complete follow-up sequences. AI in digital marketing personalizes each message based on lead data and engagement. The AI marketing automation then sends these messages and tracks responses automatically.

questions.question: How does WhatsApp marketing automation work?
questions.answer: Native WhatsApp integration is built into our CRM system. When leads engage with forms or content, AI marketing automation triggers personalized WhatsApp messages. You can send broadcast messages, automated follow-ups, and reminders - all managed through our AI digital marketing platform.

questions.question: Do I get analytics for my AI marketing automation?
questions.answer: Yes. Our AI in digital marketing provides unified analytics across all channels. Track email opens, form submissions, content views, WhatsApp conversations, and lead scoring in one dashboard. The CRM system shows your complete customer relationship management data with AI-powered insights.

questions.question: Is my data secure in your CRM system?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Our customer relationship management system uses industry-standard encryption. All data in our AI digital marketing platform is protected with passwords, expiry dates, and access controls. We're privacy-compliant and don't use external tracking scripts.

questions.question: Can I try the AI digital marketing platform before committing?
questions.answer: Yes. Request a demo to see our AI marketing automation, dynamic form builder, CRM system, and AI in digital marketing features in action. We'll show you how the complete platform works and help you get started with lead generation and sales automation.
